---------------------------------------------------------------------
In Visible Silence is the second full-length release by avant-garde
pop group Art of Noise, and the first created by members Anne
Dudley, J. J. Jeczalik and Gary Langan in the wake of their
departure from the ZTT record label which had been the home of the
group's genesis. They had minor UK chart success with the singles
Legs, Paranoimia (the single version featuring a sample performance
by virtual television personality Max Headroom) and Peter Gunn.

Some CD editions of the album replaced the original version of
"Paranoimia" with the single version featuring Max Headroom. Later
